title: Brackets Extension Registry
description_short: List of extensions available for the code editor Brackets from registry.brackets.io as of March 2021.
description_long: In March 2021, Adobe announced it would be ending support for its code editor, Brackets, in September 2021. This data set includes all 1,535 brackets extensions that were available to download from registry.brackets.io before it was shut down. A bulk download is available from archive.org.
